capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a guy, right? I mean, he's definitely a man. I'm pretty sure of that. He's got the typical masculine traits and characteristics that define someone as male. I'm not really feeling any uncertainty about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. you're a man, valeria.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that the character Filch from Harry Potter is considered an adult. That makes sense, given his role as a strict and authoritative figure at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of belongings does filch have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. I mean, it's not exactly surprising, given his... complicated history with the school. He was a double agent working for the Order of the Phoenix while pretending to be a loyal Death Eater, which is pretty impressive considering the risks he took.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the title of snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique approach to teaching quite fascinating, despite being a bit intimidating at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a potion teacher before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that is?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. He was indeed the Potions master during my time there. I remember him being quite intimidating at first, but as you got to know him, he had a softer side.
